Name: Dart Around
Description: Rotate one hero card on your field or on your partner's field.

Name: Slip Past
Description: Deal 2 damage directly to the encounter deck as if there were no enemies on the field.

Name: Nut Assault
Description:
Discard each action on your field.
Deal X damage divided as you choose among one or more enemies, where X is the number of actions discarded this way.

Name: Fill Cheeks
Description:
Draw between one and five hero cards from your partner's field.
Until tommorow, after you discard a hero card from your hand, return it to your hand.
